name: PAN PIZZA
description: Our Pan Pizza has a thick crust that’s baked to golden perfection, crispy on the outside, soft and chewy on the inside.

name: THIN ‘N CRISPY
description: Our thinner crust is baked perfectly so you can taste more of your favorite toppings.

name: ORIGINAL STUFFED CRUST
description: The extra playful pizza you eat backwards. Pizzeria-style crust with a ring of melted cheese baked right into the crust.

name: HAND TOSSED PIZZA
description: Our Hand Tossed is handcrafted with a lighter, airier crust and is one of kind, every time.

name: SKINNY SLICE PIZZA
description: Our Skinny Slice crust is practically cheating. You get the same great flavor, but with smarter portion sizes for fewer calories per slice.

name: CLASSIC MARINARA
description: Our classic tomato sauce, robustly seasoned with garlic and Italian herbs.

name: PREMIUM CRUSHED TOMATO
description: A bright, slightly sweet tomato sauce lightly seasoned with garlic and onion.

name: CREAMY GARLIC PARMESAN
description: A white sauce made with Parmesan and Romano cheeses, butter and garlic.

name: BARBEQUE
description: A sweet and smoky barbeque sauce made with real honey and molasses.

name: HONEY SRIRACHA
description: A sweet heat sauce made from real honey and red chili peppers.

name: FRESH SPINACH
description: Fresh baby spinach, placed on your pizza right out of the oven.
